I haven't had any issues with it scratching my cards (or anything else), and I've gone through a number of cards and refills of this case.The red cover is attractive and pretty sturdy, but I don't think it would do well if regularly in a pocket with other heavy, edged items (like keys). If you put it in the inside vest pocket of a suit or something like that, you should be fine.Overall, this is a great business card holder. I recommend it to others.

This is a great light. I recommend it to others.The light has several different settings and is easy to adjust. I keep it tucked behind my monitors and fold it up and out when needed. It casts a nice cool white glow that is easy to read by. It also has settings for more warm white lighting, but I don't really use those.This light did just what I needed it to and it's a great price. I recommend this light to others.

I don't know what to tell you in this review: this is a boatload of CR2016 batteries, and they do their job well. I've already used about a dozen of them in bike lights and other random things, and they've held up pretty well. I have no complaints. Shipping was fast.Note that most of the package on these is in a language other than English (perhaps Chinese?). However, you probably aren't going to need instructions for batteries, so that doesn't really matter.Overall, I recommend these batteries to others.

This is a nice, straight-forward bracelet with great-looking topaz.I bought it as a gift for normal day-to-day wear, and it was well received. I think you'd have to be careful if wearing it everyday, though, because the clasp isn't as secure as I'd like it to be. However, the topaz and metal combo looks lovely.Still, overall, this is a nice bracelet that I recommend to others.

This is a beautiful necklace. The topaz are all excellent quality, and the necklace is well assembled. I bought this as a gift and it was very well received.My only complaint is that the metal work around the diamonds looks a little off. It's hard to tell if it's intentional to catch light or if it was chipped in assembly. Given that the same work is on the matching earrings (but it is much less noticeable there), I think it was intentional. However, it looks a little odd on very close inspection. However, no one is going to be that close to a necklace (and if they are, they probably aren't looking at the necklace's details), so it doesn't really matter. Still, that's why I scored this four stars.Overall, this is a beautiful necklace that goes great with the matching earrings. I recommend it to others.

These are beautiful earrings. I bought them as a gift and they were very well-received.The topaz look wonderful and the assembly is excellent. These also go great with the matching necklace, though I like these earrings better than the necklace because the metal work around the diamonds on the necklace is not quite as nice as on these earrings.Still, these are excellent earrings. I recommend these to others.

This is a beautiful bracelet. The topaz are all great quality, and the assembly and settings are excellent. The clasp looks like it will keep the bracelet from falling off on accident and disappearing. I bought this as a gift, and it was very well received.

UPDATE: (increased to four stars)I've been wearing this watch now for about four months, and I've grown to like it more. Each new software update has gradually increased it reliability. It still sometimes disconnects from my phone momentarily and does not receive updates (like texts), but that only happens maybe one day a week. Repairing it seems to solve the problem. It also remains fairly mediocre at voice recognition spoken into the 360, but it's decent if you enunciate very carefully. All in all, it's a pretty solid product.One last new tip: if you want the metal band, don't buy it from Motorola. A Pebble black metal wrist band matches the black Moto 360 pretty well, and it's only $20 or so. It fits perfectly on the Moto360, so there's no need to buy Motorola's version (which as of writing this update is much more expensive than the Pebble metal band) unless you want a perfect color match to the body of the 360 (the Pebble band is very close, though).***ORIGINAL REVIEW:Overall, this is a solid smartwatch. I would rather give it 3.5 stars, but I can't do that here, so I'll lean towards 3 stars just slightly. In a nutshell, the 360 feels like a first-generation offering, and it doesn't do everything that I want it to do, but it's pretty great at what it does. This review is based on my daily use of the 360 since a few days after it was launched.Short version:The 360 is a great watch for receiving alerts like text messages, seeing your calendar appointments, and doing simple tasks from your wrist via voice command. It also looks gorgeous and feels sturdy. It's the first smartwatch that I've had that I can say both of those about, and I've had several other smartwatches. It also has great battery life and great watch face options. However, the 360 doesn't excel at voice commands, it loses connection with the phone from time to time for no apparent reason, and it has some limitations that are silly (read on for more on that). With a little more power, it could go from a watch that I like (4 stars apparently means "I like it") to a watch I truly love.Longer version:Pros:First off, the watch looks great. Though the metal band version is what I'm after once they release it, the 360 looks better than any smartwatch I've owned before (except perhaps the Gear Fit with the curved screen, but that was basically a fitness band).The 360 also has a great feel to it: the metal base feels sturdy and like a quality watch. The glass is durable and smooth, though I still put a screen protector on it. If you're wearing a Movado or something nicer, this isn't going to be "luxury" in your book, but as far as smartwatches go, this is a high-quality smartwatch that looks great.The 360's display is also great. It's bright, colorful, and makes good use of the circular display. You can see the pixels if you look closely, but that doesn't detract from everyday use for me.The 360 performs well. I haven't had it hang with anything I've done. When the watch is starting up, though, I have seen it stutter on the animated logo graphics.The 360 is solid for everyday tasks, too. I love being able to see when my next appointment is on my calendar by just glancing at my wrist, and receiving texts is easy even if my phone is tucked away.Finally, the watch has a great battery life. I can easily wear mine all day and only be at around 50% when I go to bed. Still, though, you should assume you'll be charging this either every day or every other day.Cons:The 360 is limited in what it can do. If you want to use it to do voice commands, it can do that, but imperfectly and you need your phone in range for it to work. For example, I often tell mine to start a timer when I'm cooking something, etc., and I sometimes have to tell it a few times. You also have to get the commands just right or you'll end up with a Google search on people who play music instead of a command to, say, open your music player.The same limits apply to voice-activated text messages, which are prone to errors. Plus, you don't have a way to correct what it heard you say, so you better hit "cancel" on the message before it finishes sending if it interpreted your text as something ... awkward. Even though my phone takes voice commands with no problem, my 360 has some issues with understanding what I'm saying.The 360 also gets a little limited when you have two text messages (or more) that have come in at once. If I get one text, I can open it on the 360 and read it then swipe it away. But if two come in together or before I check the first one, I can't open either one unless I get my phone out. That's silly. Hopefully this will change with a future software upgrade.The 360 sometimes loses its connection with your phone for no apparent reason. Even when they are right next to each other, it still seems to happen a few times a day.Finally, the 360 doesn't work as seamlessly as I'd like with my various other apps. That, too, will hopefully change with time.  This is, after all, a first-generation product.No metal band. I don't want a leather band, and Motorola should have launched with a better band. The leather band does not feel that quality, and it detracts from the overall luxury feel of the 360.

Overall, I recommend this to others. It's not a fancy rotary, but it gets the job done at a great price.The rotary itself gets up to speed fairly quickly and does a good job. It doesn't hold onto the attachments quite as well as I would like, but as if you're paying attention you'll see if it is slipping. I have only had that problem infrequently.One thing this definitely has going for it is the wide-variety of accessories. It's a great bargain when you include all of them. Note that they aren't all fancy, though. The cutting discs, for instance, have broken on me a few times cutting things. Be sure you wear safety goggles and hand protection in case this happens. As others have noted, the case for the accessories isn't very fancy and opens easily.Overall, this is a great item for the price. The quality isn't the best possible, but it's very good and just as good as any other rotary I saw at this price. I recommend this tool to others.

I recommend this measuring glass to others.This is a great, easy-to-use, high-quality measuring shot glass. Mine is red and looks just like the picture. The glass is sturdy and it has handled several washings (by hand) without any fading.All in all, I recommend this mixing shot glass to others.

I recommend this feeder to others.There's not a lot to say about this: it's a target feeder for coral, etc. But, it does that job pretty well. It's also easy to clean: just give the connector a half-twist like the instructions say and it comes apart easily. Then you can rinse the separate pieces clean and let it air-dry.All in all, this is a great target feeder. I recommend it to others.

I highly recommend this to others looking to put some oomph in their coral.Before I tried this, I was skeptical. I dose a variety of other supplements, do regular water changes, run the core reef tank equipment such as a protein skimmer and high flow, and I have both plenty of reef rock for filtration plus supplemental mechanical and chemical filtration. I figured: how much could this really do?Now I know. I feed about once a week and my corals have an obvious response. My blue ridge heliopora has come back from almost never opening up after feedings of this, my goniopora loves it, and even my low-maintenance corals like zooanthids respond to this stuff. The feeding response is obvious, too: the discs of my sofies enlarge visibly and the whole specimen looks healthier.I haven't seen a water-quality hit either. My ammonia, nitrites, and nitrates are all still at zero, even with my protein skimmer turned off for the last few weeks (long story). I do feed only once a week, and it's target feeding for all of my corals in moderation.All in all, this is a great supplement. I recommend it to others.

I recommend this hole saw to others.There's not a lot to say about this: it's a great, functional hole saw. The edge is sharp and the pilot bit does the job. I used mine to cut four holes through 3/4 inch birch so far, and I'm sure I'll use it for other things in the future.Be sure to adjust the pilot bit to be slightly ahead of the cutting edge of the hole saw. Otherwise, the spinning motion of the hole saw will move the drill out of place and you'll scratch up your surface (or worse yet, drill the hole in the wrong place).Overall, these are a great, functional hole saw. I recommend it to others.

I recommend these cufflinks to others.The red is a great rose-red color, and they stay put. They don't look cheap, though some of the other cufflinks in this price range on Amazon look slightly better. On these, the material that the red is made of doesn't have the same depth to them that some other items have, but they still look great. They stay put and seem to be fairly durable. The silver colored portion also looks nice.All in all, these are a great way to add a splash of red to your cufflinks. I recommend these to others.

I recommend these cufflinks to others.These are great, affordable cufflinks. They look just like in the product image and they do not look cheap or reflect their fairly low price. The blue is a nice sapphire-blue-like color, and the face of the cufflink is the pictured silver. They are easy to wear and stay put.Overall, these are a great way to add some color to your cufflinks. I recommend these to others.

I can't recommend this product to others. Mine had a missing item (the squeegee card) and they were cut to the wrong size.First, these were missing an item. There was no squeegee card in mine. Apparently they have been discontinued and are no longer included with this product. You can use a credit card or gift card, though, and they do the trick. So this isn't a big deal.Second, these are the wrong size. Some people get the right size but some don't. Mine were too big. As a result, the edge of all the protectors in mine accumulated random fuzz and debris because the protector was too large for the watch face and the adhesive grabbed random debris from normal wear. It looked ugly.They also are imperfect plastic. The first one I installed had weird warping in the plastic, which made it unattractive. When I replaced it, the next one has slight ripples in the plastic. It's not on improperly, the plastic is just naturally imperfect.Finally, in terms of touchscreen use, they did not interfere with use of the Moto 360.I have contacted Skinomi and they say they are sending a new set that will be the correct size. I will update this review once I receive them.

I recommend this charger to others. It's a great model that combines style, versatility, and charging power.The RAVPower 3rd Gen Deluxe 15000 mAh is a convenient way to charge your devices away from home. Though larger than the RAVPower mini, this version is still small enough to fit in a purse or suit pocket.This device is great for traveling. If you don't want to be tied to an airport or train station wall or charging station with a dozen people, you could take this along. Or, while on a long plane trip, you could recharge on the plane. If you flew overseas, for example, this could be a great device to have along. You will need to check, of course, the rules on traveling with a device like this, which may vary, but these seem fine with TSA.It's also great in everyday life, even if you don't travel a lot. For example, a few times last week I was away from home and needed to charge my phone. There was no wall outlet available one of the times and the other time I was in someone else's car. Both times, I just plugged my phone into the charger and was good to go. Both times I started well below 50% and used my RAVPower to get back up to full power. I did not need to recharge the RAVPower between uses, and it still had some charge left over after both uses.The 3rd Gen Deluxe is also easy to use. An LED bar on the unit tells you how much power it has by displaying different lengths of blue light. You can plug it into your computer USB port or a wall charger (not included, but the cable that goes in the wall charger is). Be sure to use the right ports for charging your device vs. charging your phone. You won't have trouble doing that, though, because they are clearly labeled on the device.All in all, this is a great way to recharge your devices.

I recommend this charger to others. It's a great model that packs a rechard-punch when you need it most.The RAVPower 3rd Gen Deluxe is a convenient way to charge your devices away from home. Though larger than the RAVPower mini, this version is still small enough to fit in a purse or suit pocket. I have been able to charge my phone from the 30 and 40% power ranges up to full multiple times on one full charge of the 3rd Gen Deluxe.For example, twice last week I was away from home and needed to charge my phone. There was no wall outlet available one of the times and the other time I was in someone else's car. Both times, I just plugged my phone into the charger and was good to go. Both times I started well below 50% and used my RAVPower to get back up to full power. I did not need to recharge the RAVPower between uses, and it still had some charge left over after both uses.The 3rd Gen Deluxe is also easy to use. An LED bar on the unit tells you how much power it has by displaying different lengths of blue light. You can plug it into your computer USB port or a wall charger (not included, but the cable that goes in the wall charger is). Be sure to use the right ports for charging your RAVPower vs. charging your phone. You won't have trouble doing that, though, because they are clearly labeled on the device.All in all, this is a great way to recharge your devices.

I recommend this charger to others.The RAVPower 2nd Gen Mini is a convenient way to charge your devices away from home. Because it is small enough to fit in a pocket or purse, it's also a great way to recharge your devices without having to carry a separate bag or squeeze something more bulky into your pocket or bag.I just started using my compact charger the other day. I was at work and needed to charge my phone during a meeting, but I didn't want to drape a power cord to the wall. Instead, I just plugged my phone into the charger and was good to go. I started at around 40% and, by the time I had used my partially charged RAVPower mini, I was back up to full power.The mini 3000mAh is also easy to use. An LED on the unit tells you how much power it has by displaying different colors. The colors are pretty obvious: green is good, yellow and blue are okay, red is low power, blinking red is dead. I also had no trouble charging my mini: you just plug it into your computer USB port or a wall charger (not included, but the cable that goes in the wall charger is).All in all, this is a great way to recharge your devices.

This is a great scraper for a great price. I recommend it to others with glass aquariums.I use this scraper on a 20 gallon reef tank that has some tight edges. The razor does a good job of scraping off algae and crud, but it would be rather risky to use on acrylic surfaces. Even on glass, you'll want to be careful to keep the blade parallel to the glass surface and apply fairly even pressure so you don't accidentally gouge the surfaces.In summary, as long as you're careful, this is a great scraper. But do be careful to avoid scratching your tank walls.

This is a great test kit for magnesium. I recommend it to others.If your magnesium balance gets out of sync with some other parameters, it can negatively affect your reef tank, especially certain types of coral. I was concerned mine was out of sync since I was using a general magnesium/calcium/etc. supplement, so I started testing. I found that my magnesium was in a good place.As some other reviewers noted, the container the items are stored in is fairly cheap plastic. But, it gets the job done and the rest of the kit is great quality.I have used many test kits over the years for many different parameters (standard reef parameters like nitrates, nitrites, ammonia, pH, KH, calcium, phosphates, copper, etc.). The Red Sea test kits are some of the best out there. They come with various tools that make testing easier and safer like droppers and special vials for mixing. The instructions are clear and it doesn't take that long to do. It's just mixing some substances to then do titration.In summary, this is a great test kit. I recommend it to others who want to test for magnesium.

This is a great product.I use it on my fish tank at work so that if the power flickers, I don't have to make a special trip in to reset the power. It still has GFCI protection, though, so it still works to keep me safe. The product is well-made so far as I can tell, and it does what I needed. I've been using it for a few months with no problems.In short, I recommend this to others.

Auto open/close has always been one of my requirements for an umbrella. I have small kids so I usually only have 1 free hand. Being able to open with a push of a button is very convenient. The open/close function has worked great every time I have used it over the last week since I received the umbrella. I like the compact size. The canvas is plenty large enough to offer full coverage and the handle is shorter than the average handle. I actually like that, but it may not be what everyone is looking for. When the umbrella is closed and wrapped up, it fits in a pouch that keeps it protected so it won't get ripped when stored. It's a good, small size so you can easily keep it in a backpack (where I keep mine) or a large purse. I walked in the rain for about 1-3 minutes at a time during 5 different occasions. No water leaked in and I stayed nice and dry. There was virtually no wind though so I didn't get to test out the wind resistance. Overall it seems well-made and sturdy.I received the Woogwin Travel Umbrella at a discount in exchange for my honest review. All thoughts are my own and have not been influenced.

The first thing you notice when opening the box is that the washcloths are unbelievably soft. Definitely not something that will scratch. Between the softness and the fact there are no dyes or chemicals, these are perfect for babies (or adults) with sensitive skin. I put 2 in the bathroom to be used during showers for my toddler. I keep 2 in my kitchen so that I can reuse them to wash her face and hands when she makes a mess eating. The other 2 are in my diaper bag for cleanups while we're out. Usually I use baby wipes, but something more absorbent like the washcloths comes in very handy in certain situations that wipes just aren't enough for. Spreading them out among so many different uses means that 6 just aren't enough. I'll definitely be ordering more for myself and they will likely be a new "go-to" gift for baby showers.I received a package of Motherhood Collection washcloths at a discount in exchange for my honest review. All thoughts are my own and have not been influenced.

I keep the Reboot Energy Spray next to my bed. Each morning I use the spray when my alarm first goes off then hit snooze. When the alarm goes off again 10 minutes later I am always ready to get right up. I usually do 5-7 sprays each time and within those 10 minutes I experience a noticeable increase in energy. It lasts for a few hours and when it wears off I don't experience a drastic drop in energy. It's a good gradual drop. I use it in the afternoon for a second boost most days. I hadn't told my husband I was using this and on the third day he asked, "What's up with you and all this energy?" I was very impressed that it was working well enough for my (usually oblivious) husband to notice. :-) Prior to using the spray I took a B-12 capsule daily. The spray is more convenient and it works faster and longer. I also love the cinnamon taste. It's an energy boost and breath spray all in one. Nice little bonus there.

I maybe only be 32 years old, but I feel like my skin tells a different story. I generally have very dry skin that is looser than it should be. I have been using the Joyal Beauty Hyaluronic Acid for about 3 weeks. I have not been using a moisturizer along with it since I wanted to see how well it did on its own. My skin is now better moisturized and less dry than it was when I used a daily facial moisturizer. It makes no sense to me, but I'm happy for the improvement. I haven't noticed a visual difference in firmness, but I can feel it so I think it's just a matter of time.I have used other HA serums in the past that were not as beneficial and that weren't in proper containers. I have done my research and it really is essential to be in a dark container with no exposure to air. The Joyal bottle offers those necessities. I also have a background in health and nutrition. I can't even express how important it is for products that you ingest or put on your skin on a regular basis to be organic and free of parabans and chemicals. I also only use products manufactured in a facility that follows GMP standards because it's the only way to ensure quality. Made in the US is a huge bonus, too.I received a bottle at a discount in exchange for my honest review. All thoughts are my own and have not been influenced. I'm happy to answer any questions.

I have recently lost a decent amount of weight, but my older sister has been struggling for over a year with not much success. I gave her a bottle of Diet Super Blend to try and help her out. She has been using it for 3 weeks. Within the first few days she said her energy was way up. She had less trouble getting out of bed in the morning and actually had the energy in the afternoon to workout. That alone made a huge difference in her efforts and mood. She has lost 9 lbs since she starting taking this supplement. That's more than she lost in the previous 2 months!! She hasn't experienced any side effects and she said she "feels amazing." She wishes she felt more of a reduction in her appetite, but the weight loss and energy more than makes up for it.I received a bottle of Diet Super Blend at a discount in exchange for my honest review that has not been influenced.

My husband often comes home from work at 7pm having eaten nothing all day. He's very busy at work and rarely gets a break. He doesn't have time to eat. I figured having some protein bars in his desk drawer was a good solution since they are convenient and quick. The 22 Days bars have a better nutrition ratio than an average meal. He gets a decent amount of calories while not having to spend much time or really any effort to get a healthy small "meal." He is very happy with the ratio of protein, fat, and fiber. The levels are on point with what you would want and expect from a protein bar. He prefers to eat organic so that's another great bonus. He has tried 3 different flavors. His favorite by far was the almond butter chocolate chip. He really liked the taste of that one. He said the peanut butter chocolate chip nirvana is okay, but he couldn't finish the coconut chocolate chip bar. The flavors do need improvement, but as far as nutrition and healthy eating is concerned, these bars are high above the competition.I received three 22 Days protein bars at a discount in exchange for my honest review. All thoughts are my own and have not been influenced. I'm happy to answer any questions.

I've been working on losing the baby weight and just don't have time to go to the gym. I have an elliptical at home, but doing the same thing all the time gets old. It's also in the playroom in the basement so not always the most convenient for a quick workout. That's where a jump rope fits in perfectly. I keep my Crossfit jump rope in the living room so I can grab it for 5 or 10 minute workouts throughout the day. It's perfect for using while I watch TV... something I normally do while sitting on the couch.The Crossfit jump rope is very well made and the cable seems a much sturdier choice than a traditional rope. It's slightly weighted so it keeps its shape and it doesn't get tangled. I appreciate the ball bearings in the handle which gives a much more fluid movement. The handles aren't particularly comfortable and it would be nice if they were padded, but if that's the only (very small) negative then I'm fine with that. I am the only one that uses the jump rope so I did have my husband cut off the excess rope that isn't needed. He said it wasn't super easy, but also not that difficult. You're not just going to use scissors though. I also find the bag the jump rope comes in to be a nice bonus. I can put it away neatly when I'm done and keep it out of reach from the kids.I received the Crossfit jump rope at a discount in exchange for my honest review. All thoughts are my own and have not been influenced. I'm happy to answer any questions.

I always sleep with an eye mask. I can't fall asleep without one. I have two other sleep masks already. One I love and one I tolerate. I only used the extra one when the good one was being washed or I couldn't find it. I plan to throw that extra one away because I now have two equally great sleep masks. The Rested Eyes mask is very soft and comfortable. The microfleece is perfect for cool temperatures. Our bedroom is always cooler than I'd like and having that extra layer of warmth on my face is very nice. The straps are adjustable for length so you can get the right fit around your head. For me the straps were plenty long enough and fit comfortably. I didn't feel the mask was too snug at all, yet it fit tight enough to block out all light. I also really liked the double straps. Being able to have one higher and one lower ensured the mask stays in place all night. I have used it every night for almost 2 weeks and I always wake up with it in the same spot and have had no light break through. I also always sleep with ear plugs. Though these ear plugs aren't as good as the ones I usually use, they are pretty decent and a nice bonus gift.I received the Reversible Silk & Microfleece Eye Mask at a discount in exchange for my honest review. All thoughts are my own and have not been influenced. I'm happy to answer any questions.

We loved this! The whole family (including a 7 year old and 2 year old) thought this was perfect. It was extremely easy to make and instantly smelled amazing. The directions were easy to follow. I added a little olive oil to the pot per the optional cooking instructions. We had it as a side with baked chicken and broccoli and did not add anything else to the kamut/quinoa besides some sprinkled parmesan cheese that was in the "creative inspirations" section. So good!I'm always looking for more healthy alternatives for side dishes that the whole family will enjoy. With this being organic, easy to make, and having a mild flavor, it's a great addition to our side dish list. The ingredients are pure and the nutrition levels are much better than basic similar dishes like plain rice. We will happily continue eating the various Perfect Sense side dishes and I'll feel good about giving my kids something so healthy.I received a bag of Perfect Sense Kamut with Quinoa at a discount in exchange for my honest review. All thoughts are my own and have not been influenced. I'm happy to answer any questions.

Delicious! I made this for dinner a few nights ago to be a side with grilled steak and peppers. The directions are very straight-forward and easy to follow. The rice came out the exact texture I expected and it was not al dente or over cooked. My husband, 7 year old, and I all loved it. The 2 year old wasn't convinced, but that's not surprising. My daughter and I thought the flavor and spice level were perfect. My husband likes things VERY spicy so he felt it was too mild and he added additional spices to his. I did add a little butter when cooking it per the optional instructions, but didn't need to add any additional butter or anything else.Of course the flavor is extremely important, but the quality of the product is a very close second. We try to stick with organic food with most of what we eat. Especially if the kids are going to have it. I love that this brand is organic with no GMOs. It's also gluten free which we don't need, but I do like to eat a somewhat reduced gluten diet. This is a perfect addition to have more variety for healthy side dishes.I received a bag of Perfect Sense Sprouted Rice Pilaf at a discount in exchange for my honest review. All thoughts are my own and have not been influenced. I'm happy to answer any questions.

All my life I have just had the cheap white plastic rings that I bought from a department store for a couple dollars. Those types of rings don't look good and they are a pain to hook. I was offered a promotional code to try the Just Hang Em shower curtain hooks at a discount in exchange for my honest review and I figured it was about time for an upgrade. They make such a big difference. First of all they are fairly easy to install on the rod and to hook the shower curtain and liner. We have a pretty heavy curtain, but the weight is no problem for these hooks. They do not sag at all and the way the hooks close really does ensure the curtain and liner can't fall off the hooks. They slide easily without making much noise or catching on our grooved rod. I haven't had them long enough to back-up the "no rust" claim, but they're all brass and seem like they are very good quality so I don't foresee that being any kind of issue. The rolling balls on the top are not only functional, but attractive. They add a nice look to the hooks and bathroom. Much better than cheap white plastic!

I have been taking this every afternoon consistently for just over 2 weeks. I have been breastfeeding for 2 years and have actually GAINED weight during that time. I lost 6 lbs over the last 2 weeks and the only change I made was adding L-Carnitine Tartrate to my daily regimen. I can't even tell you how relieved I am to have seen the number on the scale finally go down after all this time. I have 75 lbs to lose in total and this seems to have kick started things for me to get me towards that goal. During those 2 weeks I did not change my diet or exercise at all. So with a combination of L-Carnitine, healthy eating, and exercise I should finally be able to get this weight off! Also, during those 2 weeks my husband and 2 daughters all got a pretty bad cold that lasted for over a week. I got a very mild cold that lasted 4 days. I'm attributing that to the immune boost I got from taking these supplements. I'm going to get more for my husband to take because when he's sick he's a big baby. Obviously I can't attest to how well they're helping with heart/kidney health or bone lose reduction, but seeing how much they have helped in the other areas I am pretty confident that this is a quality product that delivers what is promised. I also LOVE that there are no GMOs, pesticides, fillers, etc. It's very hard to find a product that is so pure. I used to sell vitamins and I know how important those aspects. I also realize the unquestionable importance of a supplement being made in the USA in a NSF facility. The regulations followed ensure excellent safety, quality, and efficacy. You can never be too safe when it comes to products you're ingesting on a daily basis. I received my first bottle at a discount in exchange for my honest review. I just placed an order for 2 more bottles with no discount. I'm looking forward to continued weight loss success!

Prior to getting these locks, we only had the ones that go inside the door that you pull out and then press down on. Recently, my 2 year old opened the cabinet door under the kitchen sink and was able to pull out the dishwasher detergent!!!! Those locks open too much and they aren't safe enough. Fortunately I was standing right there, but those locks could lead to a very dangerous situation. A week later I was offered a promotional code to try these locks at a discount in exchange for my honest review. Talk about great timing. First thing I did was put a lock on the kitchen sink cabinet. Now they don't open more than maybe a centimeter. No little hands are getting in there and nothing dangerous is coming out! I put 2 more on my other low cabinets, one on my toilet since the same 2 year old is a little too curious in the bathroom, and 1 on my fridge. Yes, that only comes to 5, however, the package comes with 6. A word of advice, before you put one of these on your refrigerator you should think about everyone that needs to get into your fridge. Don't be like me and put it up above the handles where your 6 year old can't reach it! She can't get a chair every time she needs to get into the fridge. What was I thinking??? LOL. I had to remove the lock and throw it away and put a new lock under the handles. I'll tell you those things hold really tight! It was on less than 3 minutes when we realized what I had done. The instructions say to leave for 24 hours to let them set. They were very set in 3 minutes and we couldn't just pull them off. I love that they are so strong. We looked up on the Baby-Keeps website how to remove it. Once we knew what to do it was easy to remove and it left no damage. These locks work very well and are easy to resize and use on just about anything. They're also easy for adults and older kids to open, but younger kids won't be able to figure it out. Baby-Keeps also included a cute snail that can be used to hang things on the wall. Nice bonus. I highly recommend these locks and I think they will be a new "go-to" for baby shower gifts.

I purchased the caramel nut flavored coffee as a gift for my husband for Father's Day. He only ever buys the store brand coffee so I thought this would be a nice treat. I received a promotional code to get this at a discount in exchange for my honest review and it couldn't have come at a better time. The smell is so strong (in a good way) that when I hid it under the bed my husband came home that night and mentioned smelling something great, but not being able to tell what it was. As soon as I gave it to him a few days later he said, "That's it! That's the amazing smell." We both kept sniffing the bag. It was kinda weird. LOL. Within 5 minutes he had it in the coffee pot and was brewing 12 cups worth. He likes his coffee cold so he usually brews it ahead of time and keeps a few days worth in the fridge. I think this was the first time he drank hot coffee in about 3 years! He added nothing to it though he normally adds cream and sugar, mostly because the store brand stuff isn't that good. He also never drinks more than one cup at a time. He drank 2 hot cups of coffee within 20 minutes and kept saying how much he loved the flavor. Before every sip he would take a big whiff because the smell of the freshly brewed coffee is even better than it is in the package. I think it goes without saying that the gift went over very well! He also mentioned he liked that the bag was resealable. He often has to use Ziploc bags to keep his other coffee fresh so this is an added bonus. Personally I don't like coffee. At all. Not even a little. I gave this a try since he loved it so much and because I thought it was a good idea for my review.  I actually took 2 sips and was like "Hmm that didn't make me gag." It may not seem like it, but that is REALLY saying something! My husband was so happy with the coffee that we will absolutely be trying every single flavor that Latitude 23.5 offers. I ordered the island vanilla flavor right before typing this review. I can't wait to give it to hubby!

I got this kite for my 6 year old daughter. Previously we really just bought the cheap plastic kites that don't last and it's nice to finally own a kite that we can use year after year. The material on the Mirage Fighter Jet Kite seems very durable and the string seems strong. We love the bright colors and fun jet design. My daughter flew this kite very easily all by herself. She had no trouble getting it up in the air and it stayed up so easily even when there was hardly any wind. My husband and I kept commenting on how long it was staying up and flying around even when she stopped moving. She dragged it on the ground a few times and there were no tears or anything. We did lose the small black rod that goes on the tail within the first half hour, but it still flew really well. My husband had a great time flying the kite, too. He was running around like at little kid. Pictures included. :-) I purchased this kite at a discount after receiving a promotional code in exchange for my honest review. We love it and we're looking forward to a lot more kite flying fun!

I have been taking Vitamin D for years. Just 1000 IU a day though. I thought it was plenty, but my doctor recently told me I was low in Vitamin D and that was why I was experiencing muscle weakness, fatigue, and depression. I started taking 3 pills every day, but then I received a promotional code to try this 5,000 IU supplement at a discount in exchange for my honest review and was thrilled to get an even higher dose in just 1 pill. I have been taking ActiveFlourish Vitamin D daily for almost 3 weeks. My muscle weakness is 100% gone!!! My fatigue and depression have diminished significantly. Any residual symptoms are likely caused by something else because taking this supplement is clearly working wonders for me. I'm not surprised I have low Vitamin D since I live in Maine and we have long winters plus I'm a home-body so I barely go outside even in the summer. I'm not getting the Vitamin D from the sun. If you don't get outside often and you're experiencing any of these symptoms it's likely due to a Vitamin D deficiency. Taking 5,000 IU will absolutely make a difference in how you feel. I love that it's D3 because that's the best form to take. D2 is not sufficient enough. I also appreciate that it's made in the USA and in an FDA approved facility. You can never be too careful about the safety and quality of supplements.

My husband loves Indian food. We have 2 small children that aren't interested so it's rare that we can go to an Indian restaurant. I received a promotional code to get this at a discount in exchange for my honest review so I decided to give it to him for Father's Day. That went over very well! Simply receiving it and looking it over made him so happy and excited. We love the tin it comes in. It's a great size, looks very nice, and closes to keep all off the spices fresh and separate without needing their own individual lids. The spices provided are everything needed to make perfect, authentic Indian dishes (besides fresh ingredients of course). We only had 3 of those spices already so getting them all at once and having them in one place is very convenient. The recipe book is well organized and nicely put together. They have a great variety of dishes for all preferences.They provide information on each spice and there are 27 recipes. My husband's favorite Indian dish is Lamb Vindaloo. The book provides a recipe for "Steak & Ale Vindaloo" so that was the first dish he made, but he substitute in lamb in place of the steak. It was fantastic! It was especially impressive since he had never made Indian food before. We both loved it! A week later he made my favorite dish Chicken Masala. It was different than what I'm used to, but it was still absolutely delicious. We're looking forward to making more dishes with this set and trying new dishes we've never had before. It's clearly high quality spices and recipes. You can't go wrong!

This is the first time I have used what I would consider a "real" face mask. I have only ever used the cheap ones from local department stores. I was offered this facial mask at a discount in exchange for my honest review. First off, there is NO comparison to the cheap stuff. I'm now realizing what a waste of time and money I put in to that junk. I have had this for 3 weeks and I have used it 4 times. It is suggested to use it once per week. I like that it comes with an applicator though it's not necessary. It goes on smooth and spreads easily. It dries in just a few minutes and doesn't make my face feel stiff and like I can't talk. It rinses off very easily and leaves no residue behind. My face really does feel cleaner after and I love the smell. Can't quite figure out what it is, but it's familiar. The best part about using this clay mask is I have noticed my pores are shrinking. I usually have HUGE pores on my nose and chin along with blackheads. The blackheads are almost completely gone!!! I have also noticed a pretty good reduction in a few acne scars.Yes, I am one of those people that has a habit of picking at pimples. After only 4 uses those results are impressive in my book. Though it's not essential for me, it is definitely a bonus that the mask has all natural and organic ingredients. The fact that I've used it so few times and have not only seen some improvement in my skin, but also the container looks like I haven't even touched it and will therefore clearly last quite a while, tells me this product is high quality and worth the cost. I will happily continuing using it and purchasing more when this is gone.

I have been using little kid scissors with a pink handle in the bathroom for years. Never really thought much about it, but when I received a promotional code to try these nose hair scissors at a discount in exchange for my honest review, I figured it was time to get some nice, adult scissors in the bathroom. First of all, I do not use these for nose hair though based on how much I like them and how well they work I believe they would be excellent for clipping nose hair. I have used the scissors around 8 times in the last 3 weeks. I use them to trim little hairs on my forehead hair line. They cut very precisely and I am able to get much closer to my skin than I did with my old scissors. I also use the scissors to cut split ends off my hair fairly regularly. They do a great job and I never cut off more than I intend. My husband uses these scissors to trim his beard. He originally told me we didn't need new scissors, but after using them the first time he said the words every wife loves to hear... "I was wrong." He said he gets a much cleaner look with these since they are so precise and sharp. We both find them comfortable to use and think they are very well made and agree with the description that they are clearly high quality. I also appreciate that they come in a pouch to keep them clean. The round tip is nice since it protects you from cutting yourself. One of the reasons I used to have kid scissors in the bathroom was because we have kids and I didn't want any accidents! I used these to trim my 6 year old's bangs and I wasn't concerned in the slightest that I would cut her. We highly recommend these for any hair related needs.

I am by no means an athlete and I barely exercise. Yeah, I know that's not good. However, I do have a shoulder injury that is unexplained. I have been dealing with the pain and weakness for about 4 months. It was even bad enough that one night my arm "let go" and I dropped my daughter. I went to the doctor and she suggested physical therapy. As a stay-at-home mom I don't have time for that. My doctor recommended kinesiology tape. Two weeks later I received a promotional code to try this VARA tape at a discount in exchange for my honest review. Good timing! I wrap my neck and shoulder similar to the way it's done on the package. I followed directions to warm it up and let it set for 30 mins. I have been using the tape for 3 weeks and I have only applied it 3 times. Each application has easily lasted a full week even with taking showers. The tape stayed in place very well and didn't peel at all. When I removed it, it came off easily. It left just a little residue, but it was very easy to clean off. The instruction e-book that was emailed is very well written and detailed. I greatly appreciated that since I had never used kinesiology tape before. I do wish there was a specific section for neck/shoulder application though. Now for the most important part... my shoulder/neck pain is nearly gone. I have significantly better movement in the area than I did before and it barely hurts at all and only during certain movements unlike before where it was constant. I can't say how this compares to other kinesiology tape, but I can definitely say that it exceeded my expectations and I will happily recommend it and continue purchasing it.

I'm fairly new to the whole working out thing. I went to the gym for a little while YEARS ago and have fallen very out of shape since. I wanted something I could do at home where I would feel comfortable, but actually get a decent workout. This resistance band set is exactly what I needed! I received a promotional code to try this at a discount and I am very happy I took advantage of the offer. First off the bands are a great quality. They are very well-made and sturdy. I have no fear of them tearing or snapping. The resistance levels are abundant since you can add them together to get a whole bunch of different resistance amounts. I'm still on a fairly low resistance, but I love that it's a product that can grow with me as my strength improves. I have used these alone (I looked up videos online to find suggestions on the best "moves") and I've used them with my Taebo videos. They make a perfect addition. The possibilities are endless on how you can utilize these for all different abilities for every different muscle. My favorite part is that it comes with the ankle straps. It's an amazing workout for my legs and glutes. My house isn't big and I don't have room for workout equipment so resistance bands are an excellent tool and the Fitness Glory bands are definitely the way to go!

These are just too perfect! My husband's biggest pet peeve is that I reuse cutting boards. Meaning I'll leave it on the counter for a few days and just keep using it. When I told him I had the opportunity to get a promotional code to try these at a discount he told me I HAD to get them no matter what! Haha. They are small, but in a good way. We don't have a lot of counter space and these fit very well while still having plenty of space to cut up varies foods. They are thin, but sturdy and stand up well to knives. They clean easily and the handle is great for hanging them out of the way. My favorite part is the grooves that help catch juices that run from tomatoes, lemons, etc when you cut them. No more spilling over onto the counter creating yet another thing to clean. We are both very happy with this cutting board set and hubby has already said he wants to buy another set.

My husband was very eager to try this when it arrived. I think it was out of the box only 5 minutes before he was outside washing our cars. My husband is a stickler for having our cars clean. He always took them to a car wash and I would complain about the money. He started cleaning them at home and complained often that washing with the big yellow sponge was useless. I received a promotional code for this car wash set and figured my husband might like it a little better. I was right... well actually that's an understatement since he thinks it's "genius" and "works better than going to the car wash." I checked out all 3 pieces before he used them and noted that they were very soft and well made. They seem quite durable. My husband said the gloves fit him perfectly. He loved that he could use this set both inside and outside our vehicles. The inside dusting and window cleaning was easy and worked wonderfully. For the exterior he said the the mesh on the sponge did a great job for getting bugs etc off the windshield. Cleaning was fast and easy with no damage to the paint since the microfiber is so soft. He noted that the sponge holds a good deal of water so he didn't have to dip it in the bucket nearly as often is he did with our old sponge. My husband's biggest pet peeve is our neighbor's tree that hangs over our driveway constantly dropping thousands of buds all over our cars. He's afraid they will damage the cars so he likes to clean them off often. This car wash set makes that fast and easy and most importantly affordable since we no longer see the need for going to the car wash. We've only had these for about 3 weeks and they have already gone through the laundry 5 times. They still look brand new which goes to show the quality is excellent. My only wish was that I had waited to give these to my husband for Father's Day since he loves them so much!

I purchased a different yoga mat last summer that was fairly cheap. I used it and found out why. It was too short and too thin. I had been meaning to get a different one when I received a promotional code for a discount on the Ashram yoga mat. I decided to give it a try and see how it compares. Honestly there is NO comparison. This mat is really long. I'm 5'4" and there is plenty of room for me to do yoga on this mat with my almost 2 year old joining in at the end of the mat. She copies me and we can do poses together. Besides yoga, I really enjoy pilates. This mat is far superior in regards to comfort on my back. It has a perfect thickness with a great level of cushioning. I liked the non-slip side since I do yoga in my playroom which is on a rug. The mat does not move at all. The handle makes it very convenient for transport. Not something I do often, but I can see where it would make it very convenient for someone that goes to classes outside their home and has to travel with their yoga mat. The only downside was that one side of the mat keeps rolling up. It's not too much of an issue for me now that the mat has been on the floor and used for a few weeks, but it could be an issue if you're regularly rolling the mat. I still give it 5 stars because a little rolling isn't enough to detract from the overall positive qualities though.

This knee brace is so well made. Very sturdy with strong seams and velcro. Definitely will last a long time. It had a strong smell at first, but I just aired it out for a few days and the smell completely dissipated. I have had a mysterious knee pain in just my left knee for about 2 months now. My doctor gave me stretching ideas that really didn't help. When I received a promotional code to try this brace for a discount I thought it was great timing and definitely worth a shot. I have worn the brace at least a few hours a day for about 2 weeks. My knee pain is not gone, but is significantly better. I am no longer making pain noises when I stand up and my knee hasn't "given out" at all. Something it had done a few times that resulted in me falling over. It's not all that comfortable to wear alone so I wear it over my pants. I do wish the straps were longer. I wear size 12 pants and the straps for the brace just barely wrap around my knee enough to hold tight. It's technically fine for me, but someone of a larger size would probably find this wouldn't be large enough for them. I do not currently have a need for the ankle brace, but I did try it on and felt that it fit very well and was comfortable. Happy to have that in case it's needed in the future.

I purchased this watercolor pencil set for my daughter's birthday present for her 7th birthday. Drawing is basically her favorite interest and she's amazing. She has filled so many drawing books with hundreds of crayon drawings. I felt like it was time to step it up a notch so I jumped at the chance when I got a promotional code to try these at a discount. I haven't given them to her yet, but I did try them out for myself to make sure they were going to work the way I hoped. They are perfect! There's a great variety of beautiful, bold colors, the pencils are strong and the tips do not break easily. They are very easy to sharpen without any issues. The color covers nice and smooth. The practice drawing I did came out beautiful and I have never used watercolor pencils before. This is so much better than using regular colored pencils or trying to get a good effect with watercolor paints. I love the metal case that they come in. It looks nice and will keep them all together and safe. Pretty important when they belong to a child. She is going to be thrilled. I do agree that paper specifically intended for watercolor is best. I used regular printer paper and it was fine, but I could tell it would have been better with the correct type of paper. Though I loved the pencils and I was surprised how well I did with them, I am NOT an artist so I'm not going to share my painting right now, but I anticipate my daughter making some very share-worthy pictures that I will post later. :-)

I have tried many face serums over the years. It's becoming more and more necessary for me to need a great one. When I received a promotional code to try this at a discount I decided it was worth the try. I was right. The most important thing I wanted it for was to help with scaring. I'm not proud to admit it, but I tend to have a nervous habit of picking at my pimples and leaving acne scars. I have 3 very noticeable ones on my chin. I've been using this serum for almost 3 weeks and the scars that I've had for 2 years are about half what they used to be. I am in shock. I'm not sure if they'll go away completely, but I'm thrilled with the results so far and anticipate even more improvement. I also love that the serum has made a nice difference in skin firmness around my neck. I've lost weight recently and loose skin was a little bit of an issue. Again, not completely rectified, but clearly going in the right direction. The serum is very moisturizing so I don't even bother with an additional moisturizer. It's not greasy or sticky and absorbs nicely. The pump works well and doesn't give too much so I'm not wasting any by getting too much out at once. My skin is looking great and is crazy smooth. I will be happy to continue using this and be able to stop searching since I found a serum that really works for me.

My mother has celiac disease and a great number of digestive issues. I've been telling her for years to try a probiotic, but she never got around to it. When I received a promotional code for the Ultra-Biotics, I figured I'd buy it for her and get her to see how much it can really help. With celiac she doesn't absorb nutrients from her food very well. This leads to her being very tired. The first thing she noticed after taking these is that her energy levels increased a great deal. She also noticed after about 2 weeks that her nails were stronger and her skin looked better. Again, issues she experienced because of the lack of vitamins absorbed. Clearly this was helping! She also noticed she had less gas and stomach "noise" after eating. She is very happy with the results and plans to continue with this brand for the long haul. She also said she appreciated the convenience of not having to refrigerate the bottle. The price is great considering the fact you're getting the benefits of both a probiotic and prebiotic. It's not easy to find a good quality product that has both for such a great price. My mother says, "Thank you for such a wonderful product. It has made a huge difference for me and I look forward to continuing."

I recently went on a diet and started eating much healthier. This included a salad for lunch every day plus 1-2 veggies with dinner. Also more fruit. Well it didn't take long before my digestive system was upset with all the ruffage. I was experiencing gas, bloating, crazy stomach noises, and stomach pain. I was advised to take a probiotic and when I received a promotional code for the Living Natural probiotic I figured it was a good idea to give it a try. Almost immediately I noticed a difference and within 4 days my symptoms were completely gone. Gone! Absolutely no more stomach issues from the veggies/fruits. That was a big relief on it's own, but I also noticed I had more energy. Now I can't be sure it's because of the supplements or my improved eating, but I think the probiotics definitely had something to do with it. At the very least the fact that they are likely helping with the digestion of my food which I'm sure increased the amount of nutrients my body is absorbing. I feel like this probiotic is also helping in my weight loss efforts. It's a quality product that I'm happy to recommend and continue taking.

I am a nursing mom and I have 2 nursing covers already. Not super thrilled with either of them. When I was given a promotional code in exchange for my honest review I figured it was worth giving another cover a try. Compared to the other 2 covers I have, this is definitely my favorite. It's very large and gives excellent, full coverage. I am nursing a 21 month old so we need a good sized cover to remain discreet. The velcro fastener worked well for me. It was easy to attach and line up where I needed it so that I still had a good opening at the top so I can see my daughter, but not show too much. The pattern is very nice. Not too flashy and very gender neutral. I appreciate that the cover comes with a bag to help keep it clean. I used to keep my other covers in plastic Ziploc bags in my diaper bag. When I first received this I noticed a slight odor to it and the material was a bit stiff. I washed it before using it and that removed the odor and softened the fabric to where I believe a nursing cover should be. It was soft and not irritation on our skin. The cover is well made with strong seams so it won't come apart during the many washes I expect it will get. I also appreciated the suggestions for other uses. I guess I always assumed when you're done nursing you're done using your nursing cover. I never thought to use it as a changing pad, blanket, or cover for the stroller. Excellent suggestions to help get more use out of an otherwise time-limited product. My only suggestion would be for the pictures accompanying the product. Perhaps a better selling image would be that of a woman of nursing age nursing an actual baby rather than an older woman past mothering age nursing a doll.

I learned a few months ago the using dryer sheets is very bad for your health. I switched to wool dryer balls instead. They are working amazingly, but I miss the added scent since we use unscented laundry detergent. I received a promotional code to get this essential oil for a discount so I thought I'd give it a try. My husband was a little leery at first about having our clothes smell like lemon. He thought it would be weird. We've been using it for 2 weeks, which in this house means about 10 loads of laundry. We just add 1 drop to each of the 3 wool dryer balls after the clothes are dry. Then we put it on the lowest heat setting for an additional 10 minutes. Our clothes smell GREAT! It works so well and both my husband and I enjoy the scent. Even though that's the main reason I wanted this, I love that there are additional uses because it's lemon and not a flower scent. I have begun adding it to water in a spray bottle for a disinfectant to clean the kitchen. We have young kids so I feel much better using this than a chemical. It's safe, works wonderfully, and smells clean and fresh.

I got this organizer for my husband's truck because he tends have a bunch of junk all over the floor. We had to put car seats in the truck and it was time to get his stuff picked up. I received a coupon code in exchange for my honest review. First off, the organizer is very well made. It's made of quality material with strong seams/stitching so it's not going to tear. The material seems like it will be easy to wipe off when needed so it stays clean. The different sections are all a good size for holding a variety of items. Hubby keeps the car seat manuals, our "dine around" coupon book, WD-40, cleaning rags, and a few other "guy" things in there. I also keep an extra pack of baby wipes. There's a decent amount of space. It hooks easily to the seat and definitely helps with keeping the truck organized. We'll be getting one for my van as well.

These are going to be great for my daughter's birthday party! We're having a garden theme party with butterflies and flowers. The pink pom poms can easily pass as a flower decoration we can hang from the ceiling. After the party we're going to hang them in her bedroom. I love that they can be used for so many different events and then saved for home decorations rather than throwing them out like you usually have to do after a party. I took 1 out of the package to check it out and see what I'll be "working with" for the party. It took just a few minutes to get the pom fluffed up. It looked exactly how I expected. They are easy to fluff and are a great quality. I received a promotional code for these so I only purchased the 1 discounted set to try out. Now that I know I like them so much I'm going to order a few more sets so I can have different colors and sizes to make it more interesting and fun. I will definitely keep them in mind for future birthday parties and baby showers.

I used to use an eyelash curler all the time, but when it broke a few years ago I didn't bother replacing it. There have been a few occasions since then where I've wished I had one. When I was offered this as a promotion for my honest review, I figured it was time to finally get a new one! I forgot just how much of a difference they can make. I have short, thin eyelashes so adding curl really makes them look so much nicer. The Iris in Paris eyelash curler is very easy to use and curls just they way I would expect. I always get the results I want. The handle is comfortable and the curler appears to be great quality. I don't think I need to be concerned about it breaking like my old one.As for the false lashes... not something I ever had an interest in, but since it came with the curler I figured I'd give it a try. For a first timer they were very easy to apply. They made a HUGE difference! My eyes really did look sexier. ;-)  I didn't leave them on long, maybe 2 hours, but during that time I didn't experience any discomfort. In fact I forgot they were even on. The lashes were easy to take off and seem like they will last a while if I take care of them. I can't wait for a date night with hubby so I can really get some good use of them.

I don't have a GoPro so when I got a promotional code to try this at a discount I almost didn't bother. Then I realized it said it can be used with a Kindle so I figured I'd give it a try. I have a Kindle Fire HD that I take out with me all the time. I didn't have any kind of case for it and I know I really should. The Kindle fits perfectly in the mesh pouch on the smaller side of the case. It's nice and snug so it isn't banging around, but it's still easy to get in and out. I removed the foam insert from the case that's intended for the GoPro. There is plenty of space to carry my cellphone charger, headphones, and numerous other items in the other half of the case. I can throw it in my backpack and not have to worry about it. My 6 year old is just now starting to use my Kindle to read books when we're out. Now I know when she inevitably drops it (while in the case) that it will be safe! The case is sturdy and well made. The material is soft and looks very stylish. This is a great buy!

First off, this is just too cute!! My daughter is too old for this now, but when I received a coupon I just couldn't pass it up. My sister in law is pregnant so I figured it would be a cute baby shower gift for a boy or girl. It's perfect. Just a fantastic idea. The koala is cute and durable. I appreciate that the eyes are sown on which makes it baby safe. Pacifiers are always getting lost and attaching them to something bigger (and cute) is just genius. I tested the snap and it holds very well. It comes with a BPA free (very important!) pacifier, but you can attach your own as a baby's needs change. This is an excellent gift. I see that they offer a few different animal styles which is great because I think this will be one of my go-to baby shower gifts from now on.

One of my biggest pet peeves is having to get up and use the bathroom in the middle of the night and deciding between peeing in the dark or turning on the light and burning my retinas. I purchased this motion sensor light with a promotional code because I thought it might be useful in fixing this problem. I was right! There are 3 options for installing the light and we chose to permanently install it to the bathroom wall. You can set it to continuous or auto. We leave it on auto so that it comes on only when it's dark and detects movement. It gives off the perfect amount of light to make it possible to see as needed at night without hurting my eyes that are adjusted to the dark. It's pretty much perfect for what we needed it for. My husband said he wants to get one for his truck and for the basement entryway through the bulkhead. There are so many uses for this motion light that everyone could easily come up with a reason to have at least one. The quality is great and it comes with a replacement screen which is a nice bonus.

My husband does most of the cooking and he spends so much time chopping veggies. We got this a few weeks ago when we received a promotional coupon and have used it many times already. First my husband made chili. He used this to chop onions, 3 kinds of peppers, and tomatoes. He said it was so much easier and faster. The blades had no issues with the peppers or tomatoes. It cut them well and did not squish the tomatoes. He did have to break up the onions into a few layers at a time, but once he did that they chopped perfectly. He has since used it to chop mushrooms, garlic, and cucumbers. All were done with ease.Though I don't really do the cooking for the family, I do make homemade baby food. I usually have to cut everything up into small chunks before steaming them. This saved me so much time!!! I easily chopped apples, carrots, squash, and pears. I was also able to chop rutabaga, turnips, and sweet potato though I had to slightly soften them in the microwave first.The blades are sharp and are holding up well to many different kinds of fruits and veggies. The chopper seems well made and it's a great size. I like the addition of the grips on the bottom that help keep the chopper from moving across the counter. I really appreciate that the whole thing is dishwasher safe! Full convenience from every angle.

I purchases this Forskolin Extract for my mother who is very overweight and wanted something to help her curb her cravings and help burn the fat quicker. She is the type of person that needs to see results fast or she gives up. I got this with a promotional discount so she could give it a try. She told me she felt a big increase in her energy levels pretty much right away. After a few days she noticed she was having less cravings for sweets and wasn't unnecessarily snacking as often. In those 3 weeks she lost 6lbs!!! She is thrilled and plans to continue using this supplement since she still has a ways to go. She did say it is causing some mild headaches, but she is finding that they are decreasing the longer she takes them and aren't as bad if she really keeps up with her water intake. Since they making a great difference in energy, cravings, and weight loss she is happy to keep taking them.

I recently found out that I am anemic. Not only is this not good for me, but it's not good for my nursing baby. I was having a hard time finding an iron supplement I was comfortable taking while nursing. I take other supplements by Pure Micronutrients so when I realized they had an iron supplement I knew I didn't need to keep looking. I was even fortunate enough to order during a promotional period at a discount. All of their supplements are very high quality and the iron is no exception. I love that they are so safe to take and don't have any junk (aka GMO's, dyes, colors, etc). I have been taking it for about 3 weeks and I have noticed a huge increase in my energy. Also, my nails have never been stronger! I haven't been to the doctor again yet to check my iron levels, but based on my experience with this company and how I'm feeling, I have no doubt that there will be improvement in my test results. The price is also amazing for a 3 month supply.

To be honest, I don't eat as well as I should. I'm sure I am missing out on quite a few vitamins and minerals in my diet. Some of my biggest complains are muscle cramps, low energy, and anxiety. My doctor suggested I take additional magnesium, so I thought I'd give this a try when I received a coupon. First off, the pills are easy to swallow and result in no GI upset for me. That's pretty important since I typically have issues with supplements. Second, they made a huge difference in a short period of time. In less than 48 hours I noticed that my leg cramps (Charlie Horses) were completely gone. I used to have them every single night and I haven't had even one in 2 weeks!!! Also, in those 2 weeks, I have noticed that I'm sleeping better and my energy level has increased. I'm having less difficulty getting myself up in the morning. Forcing myself out of bed used to be a HUGE struggle for me. Lastly, my anxiety has improved a great deal. It wasn't significant to begin with, but enough to affect some of my day-to-day plans. I have found that less days have been affected lately and things are continuing to improve.

I have been taking a basic calcium supplement for years. Now that I'm nursing I really wanted something that was stronger, better absorbed, and had more to it than just plain calcium. I purchased this supplement with a coupon and gave it a try. My first impression was that it seemed very high quality from a reputable company based on the packaging alone. I hate when I receive supplements where the label looks like it was printed on a 20 year old color printer in someone's basement. The ingredients are so much better than supplements I previously took. Really there's no point in taking calcium without magnesium and I unfortunately was doing just that. This Bone Support supplement has a great calcium to magnesium ration. The addition of Vitamin D3 is very appreciated. Not only is it the best form of Vitamin D, but it eliminates the need and cost of me continuing to buy an additional separate supplement. The pills are easy to swallow and I have experienced no stomach upset. Osteoporosis runs in my family so I will happily continue taking these supplements knowing I'm getting high quality ingredients and results that I'm looking for.

I got this during a promotion for my husband to wear while snow blowing and shoveling. We live in Maine and the winter has been insane this year. February broke a record for being the coldest month EVER! All my husband had to cover his face was an old knit ski mask that didn't block the wind at all. I asked him what he thought of this and he said, "It's perfect. I can't believe what a difference it makes. It's really warm and completely stops the wind." When it first came in the mail I tried it on myself. The material is so thick and soft. It fit both my husband and me very well and comfortably. With all the cold weather we are (and will) be experiencing, I'm glad I got this balaclava for him!!!

I use the Atal Anti Aging Serum and I love it. I received a coupon for this Eye Serum so I figure I'd give it a try. I was looking for something to give more concentration on smoothing out the wrinkles around my eyes and lightening the dark purple circles. This did not disappoint! Admittedly I'm only 32 so my wrinkles weren't horrible, but they were there and I wasn't too happy about it. I've been using this less than 3 weeks and I have noticed a drastic reduction in wrinkles. Considering how much improvement the serum resulted in after such a short period of time, I'm confident that my wrinkles will be a thing of the past very soon. Even more important is the change in the circles under my eyes. I usually wear a ridiculous amount of makeup under my eyes to try and cover up the purple circles. I always have to edit out the circles in pictures because they are so bad. They are so much lighter now that I barely have to do any touch up on pictures and I am definitely wearing less makeup. I'm thinking just a few more weeks and I'll be circle free. I couldn't be happier!

This faceplate fits perfectly on my Medela Pump in Style. I had to get it because my daughter took the yellow plug off and lost it. I called Medela to get a replacement and they don't sell them alone. You have to buy a whole new plate. Ridiculous! What made it even more insane was that they were on back order for at least a week and cost $35! I checked Amazon and found this instead... ready immediately, free prime shipping, and $15 cheaper. Thank you!!!

We live in Maine and this winter has been awful! I don't use my car much and I have 2 young kids. When I do use my car it's usually pretty darn covered in snow and ice. The last thing I want to do is waste time scrapping off my windshield while I'm freezing and the kids are in the car waiting. I jumped at the chance to get this during a promotional offer to see if it would help. It very much does! I can't tell you how amazing it is to just walk outside, pull this off, and go! Sure I sometimes still have to clean off the other windows, but they are much easier to clean and often times not necessary at all. The windshield snow cover is easy to install, stays in place very well, and is made of quality material. My husband is super jealous so we're planning to get one for his truck. This is a great item to get for yourself and it would make an excellent gift!

I'm so glad I gave these a chance during a promotion. My 6 year old daughter loves these. I tried them, too, and we both think they're delicious. She was very excited they are gummy instead of chalky like her old vitamins. Like the description says, they really do not stick to your teeth. The vitamin quantities are great, especially the vitamin D level. I like that they are all natural and I LOVE that they are manufactured in a GMP approved facility in the US. Safety standards for vitamins, especially for children, need to be high. The packaging is nice and colorful which made my daughter more interested initially. My only issue is that the first 2 ingredients are corn syrup and sugar. Don't really like seeing that.

I got this for my husband because we live in Maine and we've been having way too many snow storms. Seems like he's outside every other day snow blowing and shoveling. He has a knit ski mask, but it wasn't doing much for him. I got this to wear along with the other one. He said it fits very comfortably, isn't itchy, breaths well, and kept him very warm. He said it didn't make him like being outside, but it made it much more tolerable since his face wasn't cold at all. He did wear it under the knit mask, but only because he already had it. He said it would have been enough on its own. I looked it over when it was delivered and it seems very well made with quality material and good, sturdy seams. We are very happy with the Cozia balaclava!

I've used a few different brands (purchased at Walmart, Target, etc) and they never lasted long. I got these bands during a promotional period and I'm very happy with them. They are very durable and well made. I foresee having them for a very long time. Getting out of the house to the gym with 2 small kids just isn't going to happen. I do a lot of exercise videos at home. I like to use resistance bands to add to my workout. These bands are excellent! I love the variety of resistance levels so I can use a different resistance level for different exercises and also have additional levels I can build up to. The carrying case is a nice bonus since I use them both upstairs and downstairs so I'm always moving them around.My husband also took one of the bands to work so he can follow the suggestions his physical therapist gave him. He said this band was a thousand times better than the "flimsy" one he got from the PT.  Now we both use them on a nearly daily basis.

This thing has way more uses then I even expected when I got it. My husband wanted it for changing light bulbs in the high ceilings so he didn't have to get his ladder from the shed. It worked wonderfully and that alone would have been enough for us to be happy with it.
